messages.subject: Dragon tree park day
messages.msgSnippet: Subject: Re: RE: Unschool Long Beach I also live in Los Alamitos. Hope
messages.messageBody:
<< Date: Sat, 21 Jun 2003 18:13:17 -0700
From: Pamela Sorooshian <pamsoroosh@...>
Subject: Re: RE: Unschool Long Beach

I also live in Los Alamitos. Hope to see you at the park this week!!!

-pam>>

Hi Pam (and Joylyn),

I am going to try to make it to the park. I think I can find it, but
where might I find you guys in the park? Is it large? I've been to
several park days in the past in my last area, and found out after that
there were actually others, but we didn't recognize each other. Any
help? I'll be there with a 7 year old boy (dark hair, probably a
baseball cap) and a 13 year old girl - long medium brown hair and
glasses and probably wearing a red plaid flannel shirt (about 75% of the
time) or a long dark grey cape. lol. If Lexie is there, I'll be able
to find you. I know her from South Orange County park days. I've never
met Joylyn, but have met her husband and daughters. Thanks!

~Alyce
